name: PARASITE - Mind Control
description:
PARASITE the passage of flesh

 

 

Mind-control enemies, make them kill each other, and escape the lab that holds you captive.

 

WASD / Arrow Keys - Move

LEFT CLICK  -  Leap / Attack

RIGHT CLICK   -   Slow Time

CURSOR  -  Aim Leap / Aim Attack

Lunaruna

art & design

@ZDMGameDesign

programming

PARASITE was developed in under 100 hours

for Extra Credits Game Jam #5
